scripts.buildcity: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/city_01.glb --output components/CityModelGenerated.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/CityModelGenerated.tsx
scripts.buildtaxi: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/taxi.glb --output components/TaxiModelGenerated.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/TaxiModelGenerated.tsx
scripts.buildtutorial: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/tutorial_01.glb --output components/TutorialModelGenerated.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/TutorialModelGenerated.tsx
scripts.build_green_cube: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/present_green_cube.glb --output components/present_green_cube.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/present_green_cube.tsx
scripts.build_green_rectangle: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/present_green_rectangle.glb --output components/present_green_rectangle.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/present_green_rectangle.tsx
scripts.build_green_round: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/present_green_round.glb --output components/present_green_round.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/present_green_round.tsx
scripts.build_red_cube: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/present_red_cube.glb --output components/present_red_cube.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/present_red_cube.tsx
scripts.build_red_rectangle: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/present_red_rectangle.glb --output components/present_red_rectangle.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/present_red_rectangle.tsx
scripts.build_red_round: npx gltfjsx@6.5.3 public/models/present_red_round.glb --output components/present_red_round.tsx --types --keepgroups --keepnames --meta && node scripts/fix-gltf-types.js components/present_red_round.tsx
scripts.buildpresents: npm run build_green_cube && npm run build_green_rectangle && npm run build_green_round && npm run build_red_cube && npm run build_red_rectangle && npm run build_red_round
scripts.buildmodels: npm run buildcity && npm run buildtaxi && npm run buildtutorial
scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p ~/_git/intervolzdotcom/public/crazytaxi && cp -r out/* ~/_git/intervolzdotcom/public/crazytaxi/ && echo 'Deployed to intervolz.com/crazytaxi'
